overview: ğ˜’ğ˜¶ğ˜¯ğ˜¨ ğ˜¦ğ˜¥ğ˜¶ğ˜¬ğ˜¢ğ˜´ğ˜ºğ˜°ğ˜¯ ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜¨ ğ˜´ğ˜¢ğ˜£ğ˜¢ğ˜µ ğ˜±ğ˜¢ğ˜³ğ˜¢ ğ˜®ğ˜¢ğ˜¬ğ˜¢ğ˜±ğ˜¢ğ˜­ğ˜¢ğ˜¨ğ˜ºğ˜° ğ˜´ğ˜¢ ğ˜±ğ˜¢ğ˜¨ğ˜±ğ˜¢ğ˜®ğ˜ªğ˜¨ğ˜°ğ˜´ ğ˜´ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜¨ ğ˜¬ğ˜¢ğ˜±ğ˜ªğ˜¨ğ˜¢ğ˜¥ğ˜¶ğ˜©ğ˜°ğ˜¯, ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜¨ ğ˜ªğ˜´ğ˜¢ ğ˜¬ğ˜¢ ğ˜¢ğ˜¥ğ˜­ğ˜¢ğ˜¸ ğ˜¯ğ˜¨ğ˜¢ ğ˜¸ğ˜¢ğ˜­ğ˜¢ ğ˜´ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¨ ğ˜¯ğ˜¢ğ˜µğ˜¶ğ˜¯-ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜¨ ğ˜£ğ˜¢ğ˜µğ˜¢, ğ˜ªğ˜´ğ˜¢ ğ˜®ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ ğ˜¬ğ˜¢ ğ˜°ğ˜±ğ˜°ğ˜³ğ˜µğ˜¶ğ˜¯ğ˜ªğ˜¥ğ˜¢ğ˜¥ ğ˜¯ğ˜¨ğ˜¢ ğ˜¯ğ˜¢ğ˜¶ğ˜ºğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜¨.  A documentary film about the realities faced by grade school pupils in public schools as a result of the pandemic; their experiences and insights will show us how they dealt with their situation in overcoming adversity.  Is the sudden shift to the new learning modality for a greater cause? or will it hamper the learning capacity of students?
tagline: Through the lens of the children: education in the middle of a pandemic
title: Just A Module
